errors.error_description: The required Python version (`3.9+`) is not specified, which can lead to installation or runtime errors if an incompatible version of Python is used.
correction_candidates: Before starting, you need to have the latest version of Python.
Before starting, you need to have Python 3.
Before starting, you need to have `Python <https://www.python.org/downloads/>`_ 3.9+ on Windows or Linux.
Before starting, you need to have Python 3.9 or Python 3.10.
errors.golden_answer: Before starting, you need to have `Python <https://www.python.org/downloads/>`_ 3.9+ on Windows or Linux.

errors.error_description: The command to install test dependencies is incorrect. `pip install pytest` only installs the pytest package, but not the other testing dependencies specified in the project's configuration (e.g., in `pyproject.toml`).
